import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Unlink a product from a course"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/org/{orgid}/classes/{classid}/associate-product/{productcode}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Removes the association between a product and a course.

**Permissions:** Teacher, Admin, SuperAdmin

**Events:** CLASS.PRODUCT_ASSOCIATION_REMOVE [accepted, success, error]

**Parameters:**
* `orgid` (path): The organization ID of the user.
* `classid` (path): The course ID.
* `productcode` (path): The product code to unlink from the course.
* `Authorization` (header): Authentication token.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"orgid","in":"path","description":"Organization ID of the user","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"classid","in":"path","description":"Course ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"productcode","in":"path","description":"Product code to unlink from the course","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","description":"Authentication token","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful product unlinking from course","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["classid","message","productcode","status","userid"],"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string"},"status":{"type":"string"},"userid":{"type":"string"},"classid":{"type":"string"},"productcode":{"type":"string"}},"title":"Association"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request. >
  
</StatusCodes>
